author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT...
summary: ...SONIA EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT... As of 8:00 AM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.1, -123.5 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT... As of 8:00 AM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.1, -123.5 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
